# GDS Vibe Documentation (`@vibe` mode)

> For AI coding tools. Query with `@vibe` prefix for copy-paste code.

**This documentation provides:**
- Tailwind HTML snippets (copy-paste ready)
- ShadCN component patterns
- Design token mappings
- Single-file reference

Optimized for Lovable, Figma Make, v0.dev, and AI coding tools.

## Quick Copy-Paste Patterns

### Primary Button
```html
<button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2.5 bg-[#024DDF] text-white font-semibold rounded-lg hover:bg-[#0141B8] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#024DDF] focus:ring-offset-2 transition-colors">
  Button
</button>
```

### Secondary Button
```html
<button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2.5 border-2 border-[#024DDF] text-[#024DDF] font-semibold rounded-lg hover:bg-[#024DDF] hover:text-white transition-colors">
  Secondary
</button>
```

### Input Field
```html
<input type="text" class="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-[#D6D6D6] rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#024DDF] focus:border-transparent placeholder:text-[#949494]" placeholder="Enter text..." />
```

### Card
```html
<div class="p-6 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md border border-[#D6D6D6]">
  <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold text-[#121212]">Title</h3>
  <p class="mt-2 text-[#646464]">Content</p>
</div>
```

### Badge
```html
<span class="inline-flex items-center px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full bg-[#024DDF] text-white">Badge</span>
```

### Alert (Info)
```html
<div class="flex items-center gap-3 p-4 rounded-lg bg-[#024DDF]/10 text-[#024DDF]">
  <span>ℹ️</span><p>Info message</p>
</div>
```

### Alert (Success)
```html
<div class="flex items-center gap-3 p-4 rounded-lg bg-[#01A469]/10 text-[#01A469]">
  <span>✓</span><p>Success</p>
</div>
```

### Alert (Error)
```html
<div class="flex items-center gap-3 p-4 rounded-lg bg-[#EB0000]/10 text-[#EB0000]">
  <span>⚠</span><p>Error</p>
</div>
```

## Color Palette

| Name | Hex | Use |
|------|-----|-----|
| Neptune | #024DDF | Primary actions, links |
| Neptune Hover | #0141B8 | Hover states |
| Cosmos | #121212 | Dark text, backgrounds |
| Earth | #01A469 | Success states |
| Mars | #EB0000 | Error states |
| Granite | #646464 | Secondary text |
| Slate | #949494 | Placeholder, disabled |
| Lunar | #D6D6D6 | Borders |
| Spotlight | #FFFFFF | Backgrounds |

## Common Patterns

### Flex Center
```html
class="flex items-center justify-center"
```

### Grid Layout
```html
class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6"
```

### Container
```html
class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8"
```

### Transition
```html
class="transition-colors duration-200"
```

### Focus Ring
```html
class="focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#024DDF] focus:ring-offset-2"
```

### Disabled State
```html
class="disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
```
